item.title: namelist_defaults_ctsm.xml
item.description: General discussion: We saw previously in the namelist definition the new added variables which can be changed by the user to control the model.

item.title: namelist_defaults_ctsm_tools.xml
item.description: General discussion: This script builds the namelists for land component of the CESM model (CTSM/CLM5). To support sectoral water usage we added two new subroutines: setup_logic_sectorwater() and setup_logic_sectorwater_parameters().

item.title: namelist_defaults_ctsm_tools.xml
item.description: General discussion: In order to use the sectoral abstractions input data, the dataset should be pre-processed using a special toolset to prepare the surface dataset which will be used by the land component CTSM/CLM5 during the run.

item.title: namelist_definition_ctsm.xml
item.description: General discussion: When new parameterization is introduced in any Earth System Model, it is very common for the modeler to set some of parameters as user defined.
